text: Henry Hugh Shelton (born 2 January 1942) is a former United States Army officer. He was the 14th chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff from 1997 to 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Chairmen of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from North Carolina Category:American generals
title: Hugh Shelton
